short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly access Google Trends with custom parameters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Trends Quick Access

Streamline your Google Trends research with this powerful and user-friendly extension. Designed for data analysts, marketers, researchers, and trend enthusiasts, this tool offers a quick and customizable way to access Google Trends data.

Key Features:
• Input up to 5 keywords simultaneously for easy comparison
• Option to add quotes to all keywords for exact match searches
• Quick selection of geographic locations, including worldwide and major countries
• Flexible time range settings, from the past day to 2004-present
• Support for custom categories and search types
• One-click parameter clearing for easy reset
• Automatic saving of last used parameters for improved efficiency

Whether you're conducting market research, planning content strategies, or simply curious about trending topics, this extension helps you save time and streamline your Google Trends workflow. Easily compare multiple keywords, switch between different regions and time ranges, and make your trend analysis more convenient and efficient.

Perfect for:
• Market researchers
• Content creators
• SEO specialists
• Business analysts
• Journalists
• Curious minds interested in global and local trends

Install now and elevate your Google Trends experience with quick, customizable access at your fingertips!
